name: Wordy Loops
description:
Welcome to Wordy Loops!  Loop words around to form new words on a 5x5 grid.

Controls Arrow KeysNavigateEnter KeyConfirm SelectionMouse and PointerMenu icons Objective

Use a letter from each column to form a word across the top row, then replace a vertical word on the board with the word you just formed.  Repeat until time runs out.  Get as many words as you can to achieve a high score!

Credits

Created for Black & White Jam 8 using just black and white!  All assets including graphics and sound were created by alf0186.
